SENT.plain: Cerebral sinus thrombosis, although uncommon, can be lethal if not recognized and treated quickly
Systemic heparin has become the treatment standard of care; however, some patients' conditions continue to deteriorate even while taking heparin
Endovascular techniques for thrombolysis have continued to evolve
The authors present a case of cerebral sinus thrombosis treated with a combination of mechanical and chemical intrasinus thrombolysis
